price: 26. Y creamos al (primer) hombre a partir de arcilla seca procedente de un barro negro moldeable.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
